Inge Zaamwani-Kamwi (amụrụ na 11 Nọvemba 1958 na Grootfontein, Otjozondjupa Region ) bụ nwanyị Namibia na-azụ ahịa na onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala.
Ọ bụbu onye isi nchịkwa nke Namdeb, ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'etiti gọọmentị Namibia na ụlọ ọrụ De Beers, kemgbe a họpụtara ya na 1999
Tupu ọkwa ya na Namdeb, Zaamwani bụ onye ọrụ na Namibia's Ministry of Mines and Energy site na 1995-1998
Otú ọ dị, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015.
Zaamwani gụrụ akwụkwọ na United Nations Institute for Namibia (UNIN) na Zambia site na 1977-1981, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na ọmụmụ mmepe
O nwetakwara ọzụzụ ndu na INSEAD, France, Mahadum nke Cape Town na Harvard Business School (na mmekorita ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand)
Zaamwani bụ onye ọka iwu ruru eru na-egwupụta ihe, ebe ọ nwetara LLB (Honours) ya na Mahadum Thames Valley dị na London, na Master in Law (LLM) ya na Mahadum Dundee, Scotland.
Zaamwani malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1984 dị ka onye ọrụ na SWAPO's Women's council na Lusaka, Zambia
O nweela mmasị na Air Namibia na First National Bank of Namibia Holdings
Zaamwani-Kamwi na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ndị isi nke Namdeb na De Beers Société Anonyme
Ruo ọnwa Juun afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Namibia Chamber of Commerce and Industry
Ọ bụ onye isi na-abụghị onye isi na FNB Namibia Holdings Limited kemgbe Jenụwarị 2000
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke Extract Resources (Namibia) (Proprietary) Ltd
Zaamwani-Kamwi bụ onye isi nke Extract Resources Ltd
kemgbe 3 Eprel 2009

Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke First National Bank of Namibia Ltd., Namdeb Property (Pty) Ltd., NamGem Diamond Manufacturing (Pty) Ltd., Diamond Board of Namibia, Fishcor and Seaflower Lobster, NOSA Namibia, Zantang Investments (Pty) Ltd
na NABCOA, XNET Trust Fund
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye otu Board of Namibia's premier companies, institutions and non-government organisations

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi nke UNAM Council, Namibia Nature Foundation, Namibia Institute of Mining and Technology, Chamber of Mines Council, Junior Achievement Namibia, Vocational and Training Board, Namibia Chamber of Commerce & Industry
Ọ bụ onye otu a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke Lincolns Inn, London na onye otu Centers for Leadership and Public Values nke UCT Graduate School of Business.
Na 14 Ọgọstụ 2020, Zaamwani-Kamwi nwalere COVID-19.
